HOW
NPAC
WORKS . . .
NPAC selects, conducts
and aids activities which
relate to its broad pro¬
gram and insure maxi¬
mum progress toward its
objectives. It operates
in ways that:
Multiply resources through
cooperative effort.
Conserve resources by avoiding
duplication.
Insure and permit wide participation.
Develop activities to serve
multi-purposes.
Help others to help themselves.
Involve the best personnel available.
Demonstrate effective, efficient
communications.
To accomplish these ends, NPAC invites the partici¬
pation of any group or individual with problems
in agricultural communications or with new ideas in
communication training, research, or production.
